subject: Golf
Weather
Lightning
Skin
Medicine and Health
Accidents and Safety
Sun
Sunscreen
lead_paragraph: Golf is good for your health, but dangerous extremes lurk on the course. Two hazards not discussed enough are the risk of skin cancer from sun exposure and the peril of lightning.
snippet: Golf is good for your health, but dangerous extremes lurk on the course. Two hazards not discussed enough are the risk of skin cancer from sun exposure and the peril of lightning.
